deck.paragraph: At Gateway you will find that church is far more than a weekly gathering. Having said that, our Sunday morning worship service is the focal point of our church life and is our main weekly event.

right.deck: In this current season, we meet together online every Sunday at 10:40am for worship and teaching. Join us at: [youtube.com/gatewaychurchyork](https://www.youtube.com/gatewaychurchyork)

left.deck: All our sermons are recorded and can be found on the [Words](https://www.gatewaychurch.co.uk/words) page. Once a month we have a Welcome Lunch where we invite newcomers to the church to a lunch at a church family's home.
